reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Makes complex topics easy to understand. His coding examples are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes goes off-topic. Assignments can be unclear at times.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Wilson is patient and explains concepts thoroughly.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher! Her lab demonstrations are amazing and she's always prepared for class.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and monotonous. Doesn't engage well with students' questions.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Encourages critical thinking and class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Exams are much harder than homework.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Inspiring professor! Her real-world examples make the course material relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex economic theories. Assigns interesting projects.
